report_title: Film Animation Services in the US
executive_summary: The Film Animation Services industry consists of companies that produce video animation for film and TV distribution companies. The industry has experienced inconsistent growth as animation techniques have become more sophisticated and high-value, with movie and TV studios continuing to vertically integrate industry-specific operations. The pandemic in 2020 compounded struggles and caused revenue to plummet double digits. Overall, industry revenue is expected to have fallen an annualized 3.0% to $271.7 million over the five years to 2023, including an anticipated rebound of 5.2% in 2023 alone. While revenue has struggled, industry profit only slightly waned as the industry has increasingly focused on advanced computer-generated animation, enabling animation companies to raise their rates.

current_performance.current_performance_point_title: Changing Industry Landscape Draws Demand Away From the Industry
current_performance.current_performance_point_description: Many smaller studios do not have dedicated staff for animation, nor do most companies that require advertisements. These companies require the use of outsourced animation services to create and release animated products, providing some steady demand despite uncertainty.

current_performance.current_performance_point_title: The Increasing Popularity of New Animation Styles Has Incentivized Studios to Outsource Their Production to Animation Specialists
current_performance.current_performance_point_description: A recent trend has been the increasing popularity of computer-animated 2D animation.

current_performance.current_performance_point_title: Rise of Streaming Supports the Industry
current_performance.current_performance_point_description: The rise of streaming platforms has led to an increase in the number of buyers of industry services.

future_outlook.future_outlook_point_title: Sustained Innovation in Computer-Generated Animation Techniques Will Continue
future_outlook.future_outlook_point_description: The large library of streaming providers will enable them to devote space to more-niche animated properties.

future_outlook.future_outlook_point_title: The Wider Film and Television Industry's Recovery Provides a Boon to Animation Services
future_outlook.future_outlook_point_description: As macroeconomic conditions have improved, demand for animation services will once again begin to flourish.

future_outlook.future_outlook_point_title: Profitability and Wages Continue to Grow in Unison
future_outlook.future_outlook_point_description: Technological and stylistic innovations in animation techniques will bolster profit.

industry_definition: Establishments in this industry produce traditional drawing or computer-generated animation for movies and TV. This industry does not include other editing or post-processing services.
key_trends: New animation styles have incentivized studios to outsource production
Many operators are expected to see an increase in the number of clients they serve

tier_1_suppliers: Business Certification & IT Schools in the US
tier_2_suppliers: Fine Arts Schools in the US

demand_determinants.determinant_title: CONSUMER DISPOSABLE INCOME AND FILM RECEPTION
demand_determinants.determinant_description: Consumers continue to watch filmed content at a steady rate.
Consumers must often pay a higher price to see a film with animation.

regulations_points.regulation_description: There are no regulations specific to the Film Animation Services industry.

basis_points.basis_description: Companies compete based on reputation, price, quality, awards, talent acquisition, and offering various services.
Major production studios like Disney are a threat as they have more capital and can provide animation services.

concentration_points.concentration_description: Top 4 companies hold below 10% combined market share in 2023.

cost_factors.cost_factor_description: This industry relies on a relatively small pool of workers with expertise in animation.

cost_factors.cost_factor_title: Marketing a key tool to secure external contracts
cost_factors.cost_factor_description: Industry enterprises invest in marketing primarily geared toward prospective clients.

capital_intensity_points.capital_intensity_description: The Film Animation Services industry exhibits a low level of capital intensity.

volatility_points.volatility_description: The industry has experienced inconsistent demand growth.

technological_change_points.technological_change_description: Real-time animation naturally emulates video game environments.

FAQs.question: Does technology change for you customers significantly affect you company?
FAQs.answer: Technology change creates new medium for consumers to watch animated properties.

FAQs.question: How have software advances altered your company's operations?
FAQs.answer: Companies have integrated new software into their operations.
